rukus.text: 40|69|Anata gata wa arrā no keiji ni tsuite, agetsurau mono o minakatta no ka. Kare-ra wa nanto somuki satta koto yo.
40|70|Korera wa keiten o kyogidearu to shi, mata ware ga tsukawashita shito-tachi no motarasu shōsoku o, kyogidearu to suru mono. Yagate kare-ra wa omoishirudearou.
40|71|Kase ga kare-ra no kubi ni 塡-Me rare, mata kusari ga maka re, kare-ra wa hika rerudearou.
40|72|Futtō suru yu no naka ni, sorekara hi goku no naka ni nagekoma reru.
40|73|Sonotoki kare-ra ni iwa reyou. `Anata gataga sūhai shite ita kamigami wa doko ni iru no ka.

40|74|Arrā o, sashioite ita no ka.' Kare-ra wa (kotaete,)`kare-ra (kamigami) wa, watashi-tachi kara hanare sarimashita. Iya, watashi-tachi wa izen, nani mo (jitsuzai no mono ni) inotte wa inakatta nodesu.' To iu. Ko no yō ni arrā wa fushinjin no mono o mayou ni makase rareru.
40|75|Sore mo anata gataga chijō de, tadashikunai kanraku o tsuikyū shi, mata ōheideatta tamedearu.
40|76|Anata gata wa jigoku no mon o hairi, sono Chū de eien ni sume. Nanto kōman no mono no sumai no awarena koto yo.

40|77|Anata gada wa taeshinobe. Hontōni arrā no yakusoku wa shinjitsudearu. Ware ga kare-ra ni yakusoku shita ippashi o anata ni shimesu koto moarou. Matawa anata o (sono zen ni) mesu koto mo. Daga dochira ni shite mo, kare-ra wa ware no moto ni kisa reru monodearu.

40|78|Ware wa anata izen ni mo, shito-tachi o tsukawashita. Sono aru mono ni tsuite wa anata ni katari, mata aru mono ni tsuite wa katatte wa inai.Daga dono shito mo, arrā no o yurushi ni yoru soto, shirushi o motarasu koto wa nakatta. Soshite arrā no taimei ga kudareba, shinri ni motodzuite sabaka reru. Sono toki, kyogi ni shitagatta-sha-tachi wa horobiru.
